pages.title: Booglian
pages.text: $(l)$(#990000)Health: 15$(#336600)$(br)Armor: 6$(#660066)$(br)Attack: 4$()$(br)Booglian is a ground mob with good protection in the form of a shell consisting of Ubricite Crystals. If you try to attack him, he will hide in his impenetrable shell.
From it you can get Ubricite Crystals, which are used in the craft of Ubricite Ingots.
